revised_title: Observations and Experiments on Dr. James's Powder
tldr: The author, Richard Chenevix, conducted experiments on Dr. James's powder, a substance made from bone shavings and crude antimony. He found that the powder could be prepared more effectively using a humid method instead of intense heat. Chenevix also observed that the powder's effects were similar to other antimony-based medicines, making it a more mild and effective option for patients.
